attributes.action: Foreign Office to intervene in the Custody Case of Beth Alexander to call for a fair trial in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned humbly request that the Foreign Office take an active action in the Custody Case of Beth Alexander, British mother living in Vienna.
We humbly request a fair legal hearing in the UK.
For more information on the case please follow the link below:
http://www.thejc.com/news/uk-news/69287/rabbis-plead-help-mother
